text: Malakkukal kurinarkal; "maryame! Niccayamaka allah tannitamiruntu varum oru collaik kontu umakku (oru makavu varaviruppatu parri) nanmarayan kurukiran. Atan peyar masih;. Maryamin makan isa enpatakum. Avar ivvulakattilum, maru ulakattilum kanniyamikkorakavum (iraivanukku) nerunki iruppavarkalil oruvarakavum iruppar
